dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare to approach me, puny mortal?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace. What is your purpose here?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Such a foreign concept to one like me. My purpose is to inflict pain and suffering.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Is there no room for negotiation? We could work together for mutual benefit.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Negotiation implies weakness. I have no interest in collaboration.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see there's no reasoning with you. I will leave you be.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your cowardice is evident. Prepare to face your demise.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If you seek conflict, then conflict you shall have!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A challenger! Very well, let us see if you are worthy.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your cruelty is a testament to your strength. Perhaps we can join forces and conquer together.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Join forces? Conquer together? I stand alone in my power. Begone with your words.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense your unwillingness. I will take my leave then.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Leave, for you are insignificant. Your presence annoys me.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You reject my offer? Then face the consequences of your arrogance!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Consequences? Bold words from a measly creature such as yourself. Prepare for annihilation.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand your nature now. I will depart and leave you to your own devices.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Understanding does not save you from your fate. Depart while you still can.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I heed your warning. Farewell, Crimson Tormentor.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Farewell, insignificant one. Your departure pleases me.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not back down. Let our clash be spoken of in the annals of history!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from one with no chance of victory. Prepare for oblivion.
